@Ocean_4549
 @Coining203
 and 
@WillyWonkaXRP
A few things:

(1) One appeals court ruling in Florida does not legitimize anything.

(2) The ruling doesn't define bitcoin as legal tender, but rather as "a payment instrument." Big difference.

(3) The practical effect is that more bitcoin-related conduct is illegal. Not good.
